[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ module_class=”custom_row” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”second-on-mobile” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_letter_spacing=”5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”]

Canada’s Best Flower Delivery Service

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”15%” module_alignment=”center”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#4A4850″ text_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”50px” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Sarah – DIY Maven

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px”]

Meet Sarah! You Floral was created after Sarah was on the search for bulk flowers to DIY her Okanagan wedding in Summer 2019. She realized that there is a gap in the floral business, not that many options exist for the DIY’er – so Sarah decided to change that! Based in Victoria, Sarah has lived in many places throughout Canada, and is excited to serve couples in:

B.C (Lower Mainland, Greater Victoria, Greater Nanaimo, Shuswap, Kamloops, Okanagan, Larger centres in the Kootenays),

Alberta (Greater Edmonton (Includes Spruce Grove, St. Albert)/Calgary (Includes Cochrane, Chestermere, Airdrie, and Okotoks)

Saskatchewan (Saskatoon)

Manitoba (Winnipeg)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/shop” button_text=”shop now” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”16px” button_text_color=”#FAF7F2″ button_bg_color=”#f9ab95″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”5px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” button_on_hover=”off” custom_padding=”13px|45px|13px|35px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#ea9f8c” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”first-on-mobile ” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.youfloral.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/sarah_florist.jpg” alt=”Sarah Florist” title_text=”Sarah Florist” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”||50px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||70px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”30px” box_shadow_vertical=”30px” box_shadow_color=”#F5F5F5″ locked=”off”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
